pages.text: The usual source of fuel that will power your Reactors.$(br2)Yellorite can be found in almost all biomes and can be smelted to produce Yellorium ingots.
Yellorium, in ingot or block form, can be inserted in an Access Port to be converted into fuel for your Reactor.
